author: Adrian Collins
description:
In A Knight’s War, an indie dark fantasy from director Matthew Ninaber, a knight is betrayed by his brother and enlists the help of a demon to track down the chosen one—a fiery haired young woman the entire kingdom has been trying to burn. The first thing I’ll say about this production–that I think grimdark fans […]

The post REVIEW: A Knight’s War appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: A Knight’s War
